item.title: ECW 2022 - Crackme16
item.description: Crackme16 is a reverse-engineering challenge I designed for the finals of the European Cyber Week 2022. Here is the source code for this challenge. We’re given an os.bin file. Let’s see what it is: 1$ file os.bin 2os.bin: DOS/MBR boot sector; partition 1 : ID=0xb2, active 0xb0, start-CHS 3(0x194,19,46), end-CHS (0x3e0,51,38), startsector 1456018950, 2168693133 4sectors; partition 3 : ID=0x22, active 0xc1, start-CHS (0x330,141,6), end-CHS 5(0x362,150,34), startsector 3705749179, 1985222079 sectors A DOS/MBR boot sector?
